item.title: Vánoční křížovka 2024
item.description:
Během těchto vánoc jsem dal dohromady křížovku. Pěkné svátky, zde je (včetně zdroje), pro všechny k volnému užití.

K tomu přikládám zdrojový kód v LaTeX; křížovka je sázena pomocí TikZ. Dáno veřejně pod licencí public domain, tj volné užití pro cokoli bez nutnosti citace, avšak bez jakékoli záruky.

\documentclass[a4paper]{article}

\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage{lmodern}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage{moresize}
\usepackage{anyfontsize}
\usepackage{setspace}

\usepackage[margin=2.3cm]{geometry}
\usepackage{xcolor}

\pagenumbering{gobble}

\usepackage{tikz}

\newcommand\mainfontsize{\linespread{1.0}\ttfamily\fontsize{10pt}{10pt}\selectfont}
\newcommand\smallfontsize{\linespread{1.0}\ttfamily\fontsize{6pt}{6pt}\selectfont}

\renewcommand{\baselinestretch}{1.0}

\begin{document}

% \noindent
% \mainfontsize
% Neque porro quisquam est qui dolorem ipsum quia dolor sit amet, consectetur, adipisci velit...

% position
\newcommand{\mythickbox}[2]{%
    \node[draw,fill=white,line width=1.3pt,align=center,minimum width=10mm,minimum height=10mm] at (#1,-#2) {};%
}

\newcommand{\mytext}[3]{%
    \node[align=center,text width=10mm] at (#1,-#2) {%
        \smallfontsize%
        #3%
        \\%
    };
}

\newcommand{\mytextbox}[3]{%
    \mythickbox{#1}{#2}
    \mytext{#1}{#2}{#3}
}

\newcommand{\mytextboxy}[4]{%
    \def\val{%
        \smallfontsize%
        #3%
        \vspace{1pt}%
        \hrule%
        \vspace{1pt}%
        #4%
    }
    \mythickbox{#1}{#2}
    \mytext{#1}{#2}{\val}
}

\begin{figure}[h]
    \centering
    % \newcommand{\puzzlewidth}{15}
    % \newcommand{\puzzleheight}{15}
    \begin{tikzpicture}
        \begin{scope}[xshift=-.5cm,yshift=+.5cm]
            \draw[fill=gray!30,] (0.0,-8.0) rectangle (16.0,-9.0);
            \draw[fill=gray!30,] (0.0,-2.0) rectangle (7.0,-3.0);
            \draw[fill=gray!30,] (11.0,-8.0) rectangle (12.0,-14.0);
        \end{scope}
        \foreach[count=\r] \row in {
            {s,v,o,j,i,t, , ,s,l,e,v,a, , },
            {v,e,s,e,l,e, , ,t,e,l,e,c,i,m},
            {a,l,e,l,u,j,a, ,o,m,e,l,e,t,a},
            {r,e,k, ,z,d,r,o,j, ,g,a,r,a,z},
            {a, , ,b,e,e,r, ,e,l,a, , ,l,a},
            {k,o,s,a, ,n,a, ,d,e,n,a,r, ,n},
            { ,a,u,t,a, , ,t,e,c, ,b,o,z,e},
            {a,s,t,a,s,t,n,y,n,o,v,y,r,o,k},
            {n,i,e, ,i,n,d, ,a,s,a,s,i,n, },
            {o,s,r,a,m, ,r,o,c, ,n,e,s, , },
            { , ,e,b,e,n, ,s,t,r,o,m,e,k, },
            {e,i,n,s,t,e,i,n, ,o,c, ,k,e,l},
            {a,n, , ,r,o,d,o,k,m,e,n, ,j,o},
            {s,r,s,t,i,n, ,v,s,e, ,o,c,t,y},
            {t,i,k, ,e,y,u,a,i,o, ,v,p,a,d}%
        } {
            \foreach[count=\c] \value in \row {
                % \mytext{\c}{\r}{\mainfontsize\value}
            }
        }
        \mytextbox{0}{0}{BEER, EAST, ID,\,ROC}
        \mytextbox{1}{0}{OHŘÁTÝ KOŘENĚNÝ NÁPOJ}
        \mytextbox{2}{0}{-HORY -TOK -BIT}

        \mytextbox{7}{0}{$\times$}

        \mytextbox{9}{0}{111}
        \mytextbox{10}{0}{OKRAJ}
        \mytextbox{11}{0}{ŠVIHÁK}
        \mytextbox{12}{0}{MNOHO NÁŘEČ.}
        \mytextbox{13}{0}{ZNAČKA ELEKTRO-\\NIKY}
        \mytextbox{14}{0}{$\times$}

        \mytextbox{14}{1}{EVROPAN}

        \mytextbox{0}{1}{ZVLÁD-\\NOUT BEZ O}
        \mytextbox{7}{1}{$\times$}
        \mytextbox{8}{1}{SEN DŮCHODCE}
        \mytextbox{0}{2}{\mainfontsize I}
        \mytextbox{7}{2}{PAPOUŠEK SE ZDVOJE-\\NÝM R}
        \mytextbox{8}{2}{MASEM}
        \mytextbox{0}{3}{CHVALO-\\ZPĚV}
        \mytextboxy{8}{3}{VAJEČNÝ POKRM}{ZAČ.\,6. PÁD.\,OTÁZ}
        \mytextbox{0}{4}{EVROPAN}
        \mytextboxy{4}{4}{PRAMEN}{VÝROBCE OBUVI}

        \mytextbox{0}{5}{SPOJKA}

        \mytextbox{12}{5}{ABYCH nesp.}
        \mytextboxy{13}{5}{POPĚVEK}{RYCHLÝ PTÁČEK}

        \mytextboxy{14}{6}{PO EM}{ZNAČKA LIMONÁD}
        \mytextbox{0}{7}{$\times$}
        \mytextboxy{1}{7}{VOZY}{ANDRE-\\JOVA STRANA}
        \mytextboxy{6}{7}{ZÁJMENO}{KANÁL NA ČÍSLE 3}
        \mytextboxy{7}{7}{DOTYK MÍČE}{SOUSEDI '49\,AŽ\,90}
        \mytextboxy{11}{7}{CITOSL. PODIVU}{\mainfontsize II}
        \mytextbox{0}{8}{\mainfontsize III}
        \mytextbox{0}{9}{NESOU-\\HLAS sloven.}
        \mytextboxy{4}{9}{ASIAT}{BRZDICÍ SYSTÉM}
        \mytextboxy{8}{9}{VRAH}{ŠKOLNÍ PLÁN UČIVA}
        \mytextbox{15}{9}{$\times$}
        \mytextbox{0}{10}{ZNAČKA ŽÁROVEK}
        \mytextboxy{6}{10}{franc. SKÁLA}{NOČNÍ SVĚTLA}
        \mytextboxy{10}{10}{ROZKAZ K PRÁCI}{PŘÍTEL JULIE}
        \mytextbox{14}{10}{KUS ZADNÍHO MASA nesp.}
        \mytextbox{15}{10}{$\times$}
        \mytextbox{0}{11}{$\times$}
        \mytextbox{1}{11}{ang. VÝCHOD}
        \mytextboxy{2}{11}{TVRDÉ DŘEVO}{JEŽÍŠ\,NAZ KRÁL\,ŽIDŮ}
        \mytextboxy{7}{11}{OZDOBA OBÝVÁKU}{IDENTI-\\FIKACE}
        \mytextbox{15}{11}{ZNAČKA ČAJŮ}
        \mytextbox{0}{12}{GÉNIUS}
        \mytextboxy{9}{12}{O CO?}{ŘECKÉ PÍSMENO}
        \mytextboxy{12}{12}{ZUB}{TEMNÁ FÁZE MĚSÍCE}
        \mytextbox{0}{13}{ANGLICKÝ NEURČITÝ ČLEN}
        \mytextbox{3}{13}{ZKRATKA SOUSED-\\NÍHO STÁTU}
        \mytextboxy{4}{13}{SEZNAM PŘEDKŮ}{PŘED Ú}
        \mytextboxy{13}{13}{SOUHLAS}{ČÍSLO POPISNÉ}
        \mytextbox{0}{14}{HMYZO-\\ŽRAVEC}
        \mytextboxy{7}{14}{OPAK NIČEHO}{VEDLE}
        \mytextbox{11}{14}{MOC STARÁ VÍNA}
        \mytextbox{0}{15}{PŘED ŤAKEM}
        \mytextbox{4}{15}{SAMO-\\HLÁSKY}
        \mytextbox{11}{15}{NÁHLÝ ÚTOK}
        \begin{scope}[xshift=-.5cm,yshift=+.5cm]
            \draw[draw,line width=0.5pt] (-0.0,-0.0) grid (16.0,-16.0);
            \draw[draw,line width=2pt] (-0.0,-0.0) rectangle (16.0,-16.0);
        \end{scope}
    \end{tikzpicture}
\end{figure}

\end{document}

item.title: Easy-to-remember Rubik's cube solution
item.description:
The usual solution to Rubik’s cube is an algorithm – do this, do that and you have the first layer, then second layer, and last layer is made via set of arbitrary moves. I always had problem remembering those, but when the sexy move (play animation here: R U R' U' ↗) was introduced to me I thought of an easy-to-remember solution.

If you want to come up with it yourself, then I have one simple advice: analyze what sexy move does, including when it is repeated several times; that should be almost enough to solve the cube.
